sentences.english: Manufacturer&exporter of candies, toffees, chew bars.
sentences.chinese: 吃及干果的生产商和出口商。

sentences.english: If you’re going to eat dried fruit, do it sparingly.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想吃干果的话，节俭点吧。

sentences.english: Caryopsis (grain) (pl. caryopses) A dry indehiscent fruit, typical of the grasses.
sentences.chinese: 一种不开裂的干果，是禾本科植物特有的果实类型。

sentences.english: Up to raise the effectiveness of blood and soothe the nerves , the.
sentences.chinese: 制成干果食用，对人体有补心脾，养血安神的功效。

sentences.english: But for convenience and shelf life, use dried fruit as your back-up plan.
sentences.chinese: 但为了方便，保质期，你可以吧干果作为后备计划。

sentences.english: Sweet toffee and dried fruits, with wood smoke and spice .
sentences.chinese: 甜蜜的奶糖和干果，与木材烟雾和香料。

sentences.english: Vanilla with a hint of ginger, dried fruits, sherry sweetness and wood □□oke.
sentences.chinese: 香草与暗示生姜，干果，雪利酒甜度和木材烟雾。

sentences.english: Spread nut mixture over carrot mixture. Sprinkle with cinnamon on top. Ready to serve.
sentences.chinese: 将果仁及干果铺在萝卜丝上，撒少许玉桂粉，即成。

sentences.english: In the beginning Mincemeat was made with meat, eggs, dried fruits and spices.
sentences.chinese: 在开始肉馅是用肉，蛋，干果和香料。
这些干果用硫处理过了。

sentences.english: Sugar-free gum or dried fruit provides a healthy distraction from candy crunching .
sentences.chinese: 无糖口香糖和干果提供了远离含糖食物的健康方法。

sentences.english: Sweet toffee and dried fruits, with wood □□oke and spice .
sentences.chinese: 甜蜜的奶糖和干果，与木材烟雾和香料。

sentences.english: Fresh October brings the pheasant , then to gather nuts is pleasant .
sentences.chinese: 凉爽的十月带来野鸡，采集干果使人们欢喜。

sentences.english: Seeberger is one of the few high quality dried fruit and preserves available in the international market.
sentences.chinese: 国际市场上高质量的干果和蜜饯不很多见。

sentences.english: Any dry, dehiscent fruit, especially a legume or follicle.
sentences.chinese: 任何开裂的干果，尤指荚果或蓇葖果。

sentences.english: Amygdalus communis L. is a famous dry fruit of great economic value in Xinjiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 巴旦杏是新疆地区著名干果，具有重要的经济价值。

definition: food preserved in sugar or honey
